abilities.name: Charge

abilities.name: Taunt

abilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement speed by 30% for 2 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.Damage over Time effects applied before cast do not interrupt Regeneration.

abilities.name: Taz'dingo
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

abilities.name: Locust Strain
abilities.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Neosteel Plating

abilities.name: Blunt Force Gun

abilities.name: Siege Thrusters

abilities.name: Black Arrows

abilities.name: Withering Fire

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger

abilities.name: Haunting Wave

abilities.name: Wailing Arrow

abilities.name: Mind Control

abilities.name: Viking Hoard
abilities.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

abilities.name: Select Olaf
abilities.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Select Baelog

abilities.name: Select Erik

abilities.name: Select All Vikings
abilities.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

abilities.name: Play Again!
abilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

abilities.name: Longboat Raid!
abilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 245 (36 + 11 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 450 (70 + 20 per level) damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

abilities.name: Go Go Go!
abilities.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton
abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 255 (+4% per level) Health that attacks for 21 (+4% per level) damage and last up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

abilities.name: Bone Armor

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes

abilities.name: Bone Prison

abilities.name: Poison Nova

abilities.name: Hunter Killer

abilities.name: Nydus Network

While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Dragonqueen
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health. While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Abilities are empowered, her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her, and the duration of incoming Slows, Roots, Blinds, and Stuns is reduced by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds.Dragonqueen grants Alexstrasza a different set of Basic Abilities, which have independent cooldowns and are unaffected by Alexstrasza's Talents that enhance her regular Basic Abilities.Dragonqueen's cooldown starts when the ability is successfully cast.Dragonqueen reduces attack speed to 0.80, resulting in increase of single-target Basic Attack DPS by roughly 57%.Dragonqueen increases Alexstrasza's Basic Attack range to 9 and makes them cleave in a 50° arc in front of her.

abilities.name: Gift of Life

When this happens it goes on a 10 second cooldown.

abilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Mend Pet
abilities.description: Heal Misha for 596 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Bestial Wrath
abilities.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Unleash the Boars
abilities.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 441 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
abilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

abilities.name: Vile Gas
abilities.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that poisons nearby enemies for 68 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Hook
abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, temporarily stunning them and dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage.Shares cooldown with Helping Hand.

abilities.name: Helping Hand
abilities.description: Pull the first ally or enemy hit towards Stitches. Enemies are temporarily stunned and take 91 (+4% per level) damage. When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.Shares cooldown with Hook.Does not hit allied non-Heroes.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Deal 104 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Deal 319 (+4% per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of your maximum Health.Cannot be used on Structures.

abilities.name: Putrid Bile
abilities.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Gorge
abilities.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.Targets under the effect of Stitches' Gorge will be instantly expelled if Stitches enters Stasis.

abilities.name: Archangel's Wrath
abilities.description: Upon dying, become invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: El'Druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 110 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport Tyrael to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields Tyrael for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 40% as much for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 150 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Sanctification
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Purpose
abilities.description: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.Passive: Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over 1.5 seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by 25%.Type: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantYrel can channel Abilities indefinitely. If Yrel is interrupted during channeling a Basic Ability, it goes on full cooldown without firing off.

abilities.description: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing 38 damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away.Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to 125. abilities.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: AbsorbingCast time: Instant

abilities.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.Type: Damage modifier: ArmorAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: AoECast time: 0+0.1875 secondsRadius: 5.5

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 10 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a shield that absorbs 560 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a shield that absorbs 420 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Expulsion Zone
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.
